text: Ra Anumzamoka kagra fatgo kavukva'ene ne' mani'nane. Hianagi menima tagri'ma tagesnanana, tusi'a tagazegu hume onkeno eno ama knare ehanatie. Amanahu'ma hiana tagrama Juda mopafine, Jerusalemi kumapine Israeli mopafinema mani'nona vahe'motama tamefi hunegamita, kagri kema rutagrona zanku hunka, tahe panani hanketa maka ru moparega umani emani hu'none.
